Something went wrong while submitting the form.Meet the teamMeet the founders Allen and Eugene.LinkedInALLEN FAN, CEOAllenÃ¢Â€Â™s led and managed carbon projects. HeÃ¢Â€Â™s worked closely with experts on investment structures totalling $50M+. During this time, he felt the pain of the current system and saw the possibilities of what could be.LinkedInEUGENE DATSKY, CTOEugene spent the last 18 years building products and leading tech teams at scale-ups and start-ups like HealthMatch, Canva and JetBrains. HeÃ¢Â€Â™s helped shape dozens of products with millions of daily active users.FAQsHow do I get my project data into CarbonHQ?We'll take the weight off you. One of our dedicated team members will help you get all your project data in!When will CarbonHQ be available for other project types?We're working hard to roll out new project types in 2023. If you're after a specific project type, please let us know! The more requests we receive the better we can prioritise which types to roll out first.How much does CarbonHQ cost?Our first customers will receive an extensive discount. But spots are limited, so let's talk soon!What integrations will be required?No need for any integrations. You can use CarbonHQ as it is from Day 1. In saying that, if you have specific integrations in mind, we're happy to explore these in implementation! Just let our team know and we'll talk through the possibilities. How can I be sure that my project data is safe with CarbonHQ?We keep your data safe by working in line with industry best practices. Meaning, we store customer data separately so there's no room for any error. Our co-founder Eugene has built software that works with sensitive medical data, so he knows exactly what it takes to build a safe product!Get better carbon project management todayGet accessThank you! About the companyCarbonHQ is on a mission to improve the integrity and efficiency of carbon projects through digital disruption.We are building a software-as-a-service platform that allows carbon credit producers to manage their project portfolio, credit inventory and sales pipelines, and stay on top of their processes.This is a billion-dollar problem, and we are pioneering the solution.About usThe co-founding team consists of a domain expert and a software engineer with extensive industry experience.We recently raised a pre-seed round from two leading VCs in Australia and made our first software engineer hire.Our Values
